entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
